TextView.android:text: Fear of losing those closest to them. Clinging to friends, jealousy, competitiveness, refusing to engage in intimate relationships. Commonly linked with Defectiveness, Abandonment, Dependence/Incompetence, and Subjugation. Treatment: Realize that people won't leave on a whim. Internalize partners as stable objects. Will be able to be on one's own for an extended period of time and not feel the need to reach out and connect to someone immediately. Learn to keep relationships that are stable and productive rather than attempt to survive on ones that will flounder.
